verses.text: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lays|strong="H1238"\w* \w waste|strong="H1110"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* leaves \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* ruins. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* twist \w its|strong="H6327"\w* \w surface|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* \w its|strong="H6327"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w*—

\w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* alike, \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* master, \w maid|strong="H8198"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w*, \w buyer|strong="H7069"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w seller|strong="H4376"\w*, \w lender|strong="H3867"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w borrower|strong="H3867"\w*, \w creditor|strong="H5383"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* debtor.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w utterly|strong="H1238"\w* \w laid|strong="H1238"\w* \w waste|strong="H1238"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thoroughly plundered. For the LORD has spoken this word.

\w The|strong="H5971"\w* earth mourns \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w withers|strong="H5034"\w*; \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* languishes \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w fades|strong="H5034"\w*; \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w exalted|strong="H4791"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* earth waste \w away|strong="H5034"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w is|strong="H8451"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2610"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w its|strong="H8478"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* overstepped \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w decrees|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* curse has consumed \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* must bear \w the|strong="H5921"\w* guilt; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth’s dwellers \w have|strong="H7604"\w* \w been|strong="H2787"\w* \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w few|strong="H4213"\w* \w survive|strong="H7604"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* dries \w up|strong="H3605"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* withers. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* merrymakers now groan.

\w The|strong="H7673"\w* \w joyful|strong="H4885"\w* \w tambourines|strong="H8596"\w* \w have|strong="H7673"\w* \w ceased|strong="H2308"\w*; \w the|strong="H7673"\w* \w noise|strong="H7588"\w* \w of|strong="H7588"\w* \w revelers|strong="H5947"\w* \w has|strong="H7588"\w* \w stopped|strong="H2308"\w*; \w the|strong="H7673"\w* \w joyful|strong="H4885"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* is silent.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w* \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4843"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* those \w who|strong="H8354"\w* consume \w it|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w chaos|strong="H8414"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w shattered|strong="H7665"\w*; \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w closed|strong="H5462"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* entry.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6682"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w turns|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w gloom|strong="H6150"\w*; \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w exiled|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H5892"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w ruins|strong="H5892"\w*; \w its|strong="H5892"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* reduced \w to|strong="H5892"\w* rubble.

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* harvested \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gleaning|strong="H5955"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grape|strong="H1210"\w* \w harvest|strong="H1210"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w raise|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w voices|strong="H6963"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shout|strong="H7442"\w* \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*; \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \f + \fr 24:14 \ft Or from the sea\f* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* proclaim \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w east|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Extol|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* islands \f + \fr 24:15 \ft Or coastlands\f* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w From|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w ends|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w singing|strong="H2158"\w*: “\w Glory|strong="H6643"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w One|strong="H6662"\w*.” \w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w I|strong="H8085"\w* am wasting \w away|strong="H3671"\w*! \w I|strong="H8085"\w* am wasting \w away|strong="H3671"\w*! \w Woe|strong="H7334"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*.” \w The|strong="H8085"\w* treacherous betray; \w the|strong="H8085"\w* treacherous deal \w in|strong="H8085"\w* treachery.

\w Terror|strong="H6343"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w pit|strong="H6354"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* await \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w dweller|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

Whoever \w flees|strong="H5127"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w panic|strong="H6343"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w pit|strong="H6354"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* whoever \w climbs|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w pit|strong="H6354"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* windows \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w heaven|strong="H4791"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w shaken|strong="H7493"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6565"\w* earth is \w utterly|strong="H7489"\w* \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* apart, \w the|strong="H6565"\w* earth is \w split|strong="H6565"\w* open, \w the|strong="H6565"\w* earth is \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w* \w violently|strong="H4131"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* earth staggers \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drunkard|strong="H7910"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* sways \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shack|strong="H4412"\w*. Earth’s \w rebellion|strong="H6588"\w* weighs \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w falls|strong="H5307"\w*, \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w heaven|strong="H4791"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth below.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6485"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* prisoners \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w confined|strong="H5462"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dungeon|strong="H4525"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w punished|strong="H6485"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w moon|strong="H3842"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sun|strong="H2535"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H2659"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* great \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.
